title: Futbol Americas: USMNT strikers, who do you start, bench and cut?
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar react to USMNT striker's performances across Europe and MLS. Who do you start, bench & cut? Then Borussia Mönchengladbach fullback joins the show for an exclusive interview to discuss his season with the Bundesliga club and his experience with the USMNT. Next, the guys react to the performances of Mexican national team players in Europe. Then we recap the weekend action across MLS, NWSL and Liga MX.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
